# sendMessage(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sends an MMS message to the given destination.

## Declaration

```swift
final func sendMessage(_ message: MMSMessage) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **message**: The MMS message to send.

## Discussion

If the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSMessage/totalSize] exceeds [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSService/Configuration/maximumMessageSize], this call fails with [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/MMSService/Error/maximumSizeExceeded].



## Sending messages

- **MMSMessage**: A structure that contains the data of an MMS message.
